attributes.action: make the iPhone 6 battery last more then 1 day
attributes.additional_details: The iPhone 6 is due this year. It doesn't need to be slimmer than the last iPhone but it does need a decent battery. I petition that apple stop making skinnier phones and just add a decent battery. The total productivity lost to UK business by not being able to get 1 full working day out if an essential communication device must be staggering.
